Class ServletUtil

public final class ServletUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility methods that may assist in writing Servlets.

encodeForHTML

public static final java.lang.String encodeForHTML(java.lang.String s)
Encode a String for HTML.

The String should only be one line (i.e. no CRLFs). 

 Converts:
   & to &amp;
   < to &lt;
   > to &gt;

encodeForJava

public static final java.lang.String encodeForJava(java.lang.String s)
Encode a String for Java. 
 Converts:
   " to \\\"
   \ to \\
   CRLF to \\n
Can be used to create javascript pages.

parseParams

public static void parseParams(ServletUtil.ParamVisitor vis,
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
Simplify the parsing of URL parameters.
